message: I propose we split the money with me getting 5500 and you getting 4500. This way, we both get a fair share, considering the impact of inflation on me.
Given that you face 10% inflation per round, $4000 now is actually worth more to you than $5500 would be in the next round. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation effects.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 4950 and you take 5050. This considers the inflation impact on me and ensures we both get a good deal.
